name: Sfo84, Inc.
description: Operator of a property rental marketplace designed to connect travelers and hosts in the LGBTQ community. The company's marketplace offers a searchable database of short-term rentals of homes, rooms, and apartments for its users as per their preferred locations, enabling LGBTQ individuals and allies to monetize their spare space while providing affordable houses in a hassle-free manner.
one_liner: Operator of a property rental marketplace designed to connect travelers and hosts in the LGBTQ community. The company's marketplace offers a searchable database of short-term rentals of homes, rooms, and apartments for its users as per their preferred locations, enabling LGBTQ individuals and allies to monetize their spare space while providing affordable houses in a hassle-free manner.
